snippet.title: Anno 2205 Arctic Trailer [US]
snippet.description:
Expand to the Arctic and the Moon - Protect and care for your workers and they will grow your corporation simultaneously on multiple regions around the Earth and beyond – including the frozen Arctic and the dangerous craters of the Moon.

Pick Your Battles - Build your fleet, unlock and upgrade each ship with special attacks and skills to earn rare resources. Replay challenges on higher difficulty settings to earn the most rewards.

Race to Space – Colonize continents on Earth, establish bases on the Moon, and mine the Moon’s resources to transform your cities into thriving metropolises.

Visit annogame.com for details!

© 2015 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Anno 2205, Ubisoft, and the Ubisoft logo are trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries. Anno, Blue Byte, and the Blue Byte logo are trademarks of Ubisoft GmbH in the US and/or other countries.
